response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the expertise put into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience and bring you immense value. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive offer to you for this remarkable product at the same price of $12,000. Please let us know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further.", "product_price": 12000}
